faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1: Can I upgrade or downgrade at any time?
faq.a1: Yes! You can upgrade from Free to Pro at any time. If you need to downgrade or cancel, please contact our support team and we'll help you manage your subscription.
faq.q2: What happens if I hit the free plan limit?
faq.a2: The free plan allows you to track up to 3 subscriptions. Once you reach this limit, you'll be prompted to upgrade to Pro for unlimited subscription tracking.
faq.a3: Absolutely! We use Stripe for payment processing, which is trusted by millions of businesses worldwide. We never store your payment information on our servers.

proPlanFeatures.question: What's included in the Pro plan?
proPlanFeatures.answer: The Pro plan includes everything you need to manage your SaaS subscriptions professionally:
features: Track up to 30 subscriptions (vs 5 on free)
Email renewal alerts (7, 3, and 1 day warnings)

billingWork.question: How does billing work?
billingWork.answer: StackBill Pro is billed monthly at €4/month via Stripe. Your subscription automatically renews each month until you cancel. You can downgrade anytime and keep Pro access until your current billing period ends. All billing is secure and PCI-compliant through Stripe.

cancelDowngrade.question: Can I cancel or downgrade anytime?
cancelDowngrade.answer: Yes! You can cancel your Pro subscription anytime with no penalty. When you downgrade, your subscription is immediately canceled but you keep Pro access until the end of your current billing period. After that, you'll be moved to the free plan automatically.

dataOnDowngrade.question: What happens to my data if I downgrade?
dataOnDowngrade.answer: If you have more subscriptions or projects than the free plan allows when you downgrade:
details: We'll keep your most recent subscriptions and projects
Older excess data will be automatically deleted
You'll receive a confirmation email with details
All data removal is permanent and cannot be undone

emailNotifications.question: How do email notifications work?
emailNotifications.answer: Pro users receive automatic email notifications to help manage their subscriptions. You'll get renewal alerts 7, 3, and 1 days before subscriptions renew, plus monthly summary emails with spending insights. All emails include unsubscribe options and you can customize preferences in your settings.

paymentSecurity.question: Is my payment information secure?
paymentSecurity.answer: Absolutely. All payments are processed through Stripe, one of the world's most trusted payment processors. We never store your credit card information on our servers. Stripe is PCI DSS Level 1 certified and used by millions of businesses worldwide, including Twitter, Lyft, and Shopify.

deleteAccount.question: Can I delete my account completely?
deleteAccount.answer: Yes, you can permanently delete your StackBill account anytime from your settings page. This will immediately cancel any active subscription, delete all your data from our servers, and send you a farewell email. Account deletion is permanent and cannot be undone.

refunds.question: Do you offer refunds?
refunds.answer: Since StackBill Pro is a low-cost monthly service, we generally don't offer refunds. However, if you're experiencing technical issues or have concerns about your billing, please contact our support team at hello@stackbill.dev and we'll work with you to find a solution.

organizeProjects.question: How do I organize subscriptions with projects?
organizeProjects.answer: Projects help you organize subscriptions by team, client, or purpose:
steps: Create projects in Settings > Project Management
Assign subscriptions to projects when adding them
Switch between projects using the dropdown in the dashboard
Use the 'General' project for personal or unorganized subscriptions
Free users get 2 projects, Pro users get 10 projects
